sentence:
Mr. CASE. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to say aloha and congratulations  to the newest cohort of Teach For America (TFA) Hawaii.

TFA, a critical national nonprofit partner since 1989 in our effort  to eliminate educational inequality, continues its mission to ``enlist,  develop, and mobilize…

…came out revealed truly  shocking declines in student achievement, but one bright spot in this  otherwise very troubling picture has been Teach For America, otherwise  known as TFA.

What TFA does is recruit recent college graduates to go teach in the  toughest schools, schools in low-income communities. It is a very  selective program. In some years,…
